name: rb-ax3

body.origin:
|- wo(wn(w0), wo(w1, w0))
-| wi(wn(wn(w0)), wo(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wo(wn(w0), wo(w1, w0))
-| wi(wn(wn(w0)), wo(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wn(w0)), wo(w1, w0))
-| wi(wn(wo(w1, w0)), wn(w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wo(wn(w0), wo(w1, w0))
-| wi(wn(wo(w1, w0)), wn(w0))

comment: The third of four axioms in the Russell-Bernays axiom system. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
